name: Zenitne
description:
Agent A, you are given a mission to destroy all portals in the area before they spread to other dimensions. Use your voice via modified Megaphone to help you get rid of them and destroy the portal. Remember, you must destroy the portal before it's too late. Good Luck!

Nama Tim :

Devinitealy

Anggota Tim :

1. Erlinda Argyanti Nugraha (Leader, Programmer) (Jakarta)

2. Farrel Muhammad Taqi (Artist, Programmer) (Surabaya)

3. Anggun Wahyuni (Programmer) (Riau)

Domisili :

Jakarta, Surabaya, Riau

Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember
